Mallie was a young individual who served aboard the Marderward for a time during the midâ€”15 century DR.
Mallie served under the malicious Captain Taraf Predeau. Captain Predeau pitted the young crew of the Marderward against one another, leading them to commit violence against other children.
Some time during or before the , Mallie and several other young sailors aboard the Marderward shifted their allegiances from Predeau to a new crewman, Harp Levesque.
When Mallie saw the young boy Kitto being beaten to the point of near-death, they informed Harp immediately. Harp intervened and took Kittos place as the target of Predeaus ire. Their actions helped save Kittos life.
After that incident, Harp led Mallie and others in mutiny against Captain Predeau. Mallis job was to awaken the adult sailors they believed would fight on their side. The young crew successfully overthrew their abusive captain, and earned their freedom from the Marderward.
